remarks: A partial result along the lines of ~ rpvmasum .  The sum of the von Mangoldt function over those integers ` n == A ` (mod ` N ` ) is asymptotic to ` ( 1 - M ) ( log x / phi ( x ) ) + O(1) ` , where ` M ` is the number of non-principal Dirichlet characters with ` sum_ n e. NN , X ( n ) / n = 0 ` .  Our goal is to show this set is empty.  Equation 9.4.3 of [Shapiro], p. 375.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2016.)
